Text.Name: PlayerName
Text.OnTextChanged: Parent.DoCommand.onshow=('hide_window MainHUD.Player.AutoLoad') COND1=(Text=='NoName') COND2=(Text==sName) COND3=(Text=='') COND=(COND1 || COND2 || COND3) Parent.DoCommand.visible=(COND ? false : true) sName=Text

Button.Name: Load
Button.OnShow: show_window Custom.DrumsUI_TextSettings show_window Custom.Player_CB_IC show_window Custom.Player_CB_SC show_window Custom.Player_CB_TCS show_window Custom.Player_CB_TP show_window Custom.Player_CB_ACS show_window Custom.Player_CB_AP show_window Custom.Player_CB_NCS show_window Custom.Player_CB_NP show_window Custom.Player_CB_ECS show_window Custom.Player_CB_EP show_window Custom.Player_CB_CCS show_window Custom.Player_LayoutFull show_window Custom.Player_LayoutHP show_window Custom.Player_LayoutPP Parent.LoadCheck.OnTextChanged=Parent.LoadCheck.codeToCopy Visible=false

Text.codeToCopy: COND1=(Parent.Parent.Name == '_HUD') COND2=(Parent.Parent.Player_LayoutPP.Name == 'Player_LayoutPP') COND=(COND1 && COND2) Parent.Init.visible=COND Visible=COND ? false : true COND3=(Parent.Parent.Name == 'MainHUD') Visible=COND3 ? false : true
Text.Name: LoadCheck

Button.Name: Init
Button.OnShow:
Parent.LayoutPage.DoExpand.press=true Parent.LayoutPage.DoCollapse.press=true Parent.LayoutFull.visible=(COND ? true : false) COND=(Parent.Parent.Player_LayoutFull.Width == 2) Parent.LayoutHP.visible=(COND ? true : false) COND=(Parent.Parent.Player_LayoutHP.Width == 2) Parent.LayoutPP.visible=(COND ? true : false) COND=(Parent.Parent.Player_LayoutPP.Width == 2) Parent.SetupAllCmdText.press=true
Visible=false

Button.Name: SetupAllCmdText
Button.OnPress:
sNAME=Parent.PlayerName.Text
sCMD=TraumaSelfSpell Parent.DoCommand.OnPress=('Parent.SetupCmdText.bCheckCmdText=Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_TextSettings.POI.DrumsUI_' ## sNAME ## '.' ## sCMD ## '.PoiShowAlways') Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.DoCommand.OnPress=('Parent.SetupCmdText.sUserCmdText=Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_TextSettings.POI.DrumsUI_' ## sNAME ## '.' ## sCMD ## '.PoiDescription') Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.DoCommand.OnPress=('Parent.SetupCmdText.sDefaultCmdText=Parent.CastingCommands.' ## sCMD ## '.cmdText') Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.SetupCmdText.press=true Parent.CastingCommands.TraumaSelfSpell.cmdText=(Parent.SetupCmdText.sCOND)

sCMD=ArcaneSelfSpell Parent.DoCommand.OnPress=('Parent.SetupCmdText.bCheckCmdText=Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_TextSettings.POI.DrumsUI_' ## sNAME ## '.' ## sCMD ## '.PoiShowAlways') Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.DoCommand.OnPress=('Parent.SetupCmdText.sUserCmdText=Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_TextSettings.POI.DrumsUI_' ## sNAME ## '.' ## sCMD ## '.PoiDescription') Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.DoCommand.OnPress=('Parent.SetupCmdText.sDefaultCmdText=Parent.CastingCommands.' ## sCMD ## '.cmdText') Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.SetupCmdText.press=true Parent.CastingCommands.ArcaneSelfSpell.cmdText=(Parent.SetupCmdText.sCOND)
sCMD=ArcaneSelfPot Parent.DoCommand.OnPress=('Parent.SetupCmdText.bCheckCmdText=Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_TextSettings.POI.DrumsUI_' ## sNAME ## '.' ## sCMD ## '.PoiShowAlways') Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.DoCommand.OnPress=('Parent.SetupCmdText.sUserCmdText=Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_TextSettings.POI.DrumsUI_' ## sNAME ## '.' ## sCMD ## '.PoiDescription') Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.DoCommand.OnPress=('Parent.SetupCmdText.sDefaultCmdText=Parent.CastingCommands.' ## sCMD ## '.cmdText') Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.SetupCmdText.press=true Parent.CastingCommands.ArcaneSelfPot.cmdText=(Parent.SetupCmdText.sCOND)
sCMD=NoxiousSelfSpell Parent.DoCommand.OnPress=('Parent.SetupCmdText.bCheckCmdText=Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_TextSettings.POI.DrumsUI_' ## sNAME ## '.' ## sCMD ## '.PoiShowAlways') Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.DoCommand.OnPress=('Parent.SetupCmdText.sUserCmdText=Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_TextSettings.POI.DrumsUI_' ## sNAME ## '.' ## sCMD ## '.PoiDescription') Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.DoCommand.OnPress=('Parent.SetupCmdText.sDefaultCmdText=Parent.CastingCommands.' ## sCMD ## '.cmdText') Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.SetupCmdText.press=true Parent.CastingCommands.NoxiousSelfSpell.cmdText=(Parent.SetupCmdText.sCOND)

Button.Name: SetupCmdText
Button.OnPress: bCheckUser=(bCheckCmdText == true) sCOND=(bCheckCmdText ? sUserCmdText : sDefaultCmdText)

Page.cmdText: useabilityonplayer MYSELF Cure Curse gsay Curing curse on MYSELF raid Curing curse on MYSELF
Page.defCmdText: useabilityonplayer MYSELF Cure Curse gsay Curing curse on MYSELF raid Curing curse on MYSELF
Page.Name: CurseSelfSpell

Button.Name: ShowSettings
Button.OnPress: show_window Custom.DrumsUI_Menu show_window Custom.DrumsUI_Menu.PageSelect.Player

Image.Name: PvPIcon
Image.Tooltip: :09e86496f3194ea2:You can be engaged in PvP combat

Button.Name: ExpandLayout
Button.OnPress:
window_property unlock Custom Player_LayoutFull Parent.Parent.Parent.Player_LayoutFull.Width=2 window_property lock Custom Player_LayoutFull
Parent.DoExpand.press=true
Button.Tooltip: Toggle full health and power numbers

Button.Name: CollapseLayout
Button.OnPress:
window_property unlock Custom Player_LayoutFull Parent.Parent.Parent.Player_LayoutFull.Width=1 window_property lock Custom Player_LayoutFull
Parent.DoCollapse.press=true
Button.Tooltip: Toggle full health and power numbers

Parent.DoNum.press=true

Parent.DoPct.press=true

Button.Name: DoCommand
Button.OnPress: useabilityonplayer Cure Longestnameposs

Button.Name: Trauma
Button.OnPress: COND=(Parent.TraumaLabel.localtext > 0) BCOND=(Parent.Parent.Parent.Player_CB_SC.Width == 1) CCOND=(COND || BCOND) Parent.CureTrauma.visible=CCOND

Button.Name: Arcane
Button.OnPress: COND=(Parent.ArcaneLabel.localtext > 0) BCOND=(Parent.Parent.Parent.Player_CB_SC.Width == 1) CCOND=(COND || BCOND) Parent.CureArcane.visible=CCOND

Button.Name: Noxious
